name: David Chiu
desc:
I am a developer from Hong Kong currently working in London, with 7 years of solid experience in both frontend and backend development.

Believe in the good side of technology, I think that the connection of people can bring positive change to society, so I co-founded the Hong Kong Good Store project with my friends in 2012, aiming at reinforcing the values of independent local stores in Hong Kong. In 2016, I joined Streetlife, contributing to build the largest social network for neighborhood in UK, hoping to construct a better local community for everyone.

experience.title: Streetlife
experience.subtitle: Frontend Developer
experience.desc:
Streetlife was a British leading social network for neighbourhood, connecting people together based on where they live. Acquired by US unicorn Nextdoor in Jan 2017.

  • Contributed product ideas and developed different features on a social network platform that serve the needs of more than 1,500,000 active users and local businesses.
  • Contributed in revamping the website with ReactJS + Redux for better maintenance and performance.
  • Helped implementing AB testing features for better conversion rate.

experience.title: Accedo
experience.subtitle: Software Engineer
experience.desc:
Accedo is a global leading video centric solution provider.

  • Helped Maxdome, the leading video-on-demand provider in Germany, to deliver video contents to over 1,000,000 users on more than 10 Smart TV platforms such as Samsung, LG, Panasonic, PlayStation, Sony and Amazon FireTV…etc.

experience.title: Hong Kong Good Store
experience.subtitle: Co-founder
experience.desc:
Hong Kong Good Store is a widely acclaimed non-commercial, independent part time project which tries to raise public awareness about the values of independent local stores in Hong Kong.

  • As a Co-founder, I am responsible for making decision on effectively raise awareness (online and offline) about value of local store throughout the city.
  • Built a web app and an api for iOS client in order to make thousands of local independent shops searchable among public. The iOS application once hit the Top Lifestyle App Chart on Hong Kong App Store.
  • Built a Facebook community (fb.com/hkgoodstore) with currently has 146,000+ organic followers in Hong Kong.

experience.title: e-Perfect IT
experience.subtitle: Senior Analyst Programmer
experience.desc:
e-Perfect IT is a Hong Kong IT solution provider on healthcare and government projects.

  • Revamped the Licensing and Survey of Local Vessel System of Hong Kong Marine Department, from a legacy web based system to a service-oriented architecture based system.
  • Built a Human Resources Management System (HRMS) for Town Health Medical Network, to manage internal human resources of over 100 clinics in the medical network.

experience.title: Vance Info
experience.subtitle: ASP.NET Developer
experience.desc:
Vance Info is a global IT solution provider which merged with HiSoft to form Pactera in 2012.

  • Enhanced the Telephone Betting Services to allow thousands of users betting at the same time with Voice Over IP technology.

experience.title: Time Medical
experience.subtitle: Software Engineer
experience.desc:
Time Medical is a startup company professional in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI).

  • Built a viewing module of MRI console from scratch to allow radiotherapist to control a newly invented MRI machine.
